answers.answer: Hi,How are you? Sweat is usually odorless. Bacteria and metabolism of protein and amino acid may cause odor and the ammonia-like smell. Other  considerations include your diet,physical activity, stress, conditions like hyperhidrosis, diabetes and liver issues. Check with your doctor for proper evaluation. Take care and regards.

question: What can cause a ammonia smell from sweat and Colin?
title: ammonia smell from sweat and colin
